name: Jonas Van Der Donckt
bio: Jonas is a rebel, romanticizes a little too much, sports a lot, is prone to overthinking situations, tries to live in the moment, reads many books, still figures himself out, and is currently a PhD student at Ghent University where he uses wearables among other sensing devices to monitor mental health.

name: Jeroen Van Der Donckt
bio: Jeroen is a harmonizer, is prone to overthinking, tries to live in the moment, sports a lot, reads many books, is currently a graduate student at KU Leuven, and has no idea what he will do next year.
